info.albumInfo: Morbid Stuff is the third album by Canadian rock band PUP, released April 5, 2019 through Rise Records and Little Dipper, the band's personal label.
Hypochondriac is the third studio album by American surf-punk band The Frights, released August 24, 2018 on Epitaph Records.
Million Dollars to Kill Me is the fifth studio album by American punk rock band Joyce Manor, released on September 21, 2018 through Epitaph Records.
